summary: *Spirited Away* is an award-winning Japanese animated film from 2001. It's about a girl named Chihiro who enters a magical world of spirits and must find a way to rescue her parents, who have been turned into pigs. Chihiro works in a bathhouse run by a witch to free her family. The movie was directed by Hayao Miyazaki and became the highest-grossing film in Japan at the time. It won many awards, including an Academy Award, and is considered one of the best animated films ever made.
title: Spirited Away
